name: Anyplace Tic Tac Toe. Noughts and crosses game.
name_original: Anyplace Tic Tac Toe. Noughts and crosses game.
description:
From the guys that brought you ANYPLACE MAFIA, ANYPLACE REVERSI and ANYPLACE POKER!
ANYPLACE TIC TAC TOE - the best way to kick your friend's ... in a smart way!
Tough combat on a Tic Tac Toe field!

But leave classic 3x3 field for kids! Try serious stuff - on endless (almost) playing field.
Player which first makes 5 crosses (or noughts) in a row wins.

- Awesome design in ANYPLACE MAFIA style!
- Develops your logic and strategic thinking!
- Competition and excitement!
- Friendly interface!
- Simple rules!
